page.title: 16Hadley Playcentre
page.content: The centre employs a full_time manager and senior assistant,together with two part_time assistants. A wide range of activities are organised by the staff including art, craft,drama,indoor and outdoor games and free play. These are designed to fulfill the objectives of the scheme which include: {The development of the individual's { talents. { The creation of a child centred { environment where children may feel { free and released from as many { pressures as possible. { To encourage active participation {by the community. The centre incorporates a large gym and is open every weekday evening during term_time,and during the day in the school holidays.
